articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Trump criticizes Abrams ahead of Georgia governor election
articles.description: President Trump criticized Georgia Democratic gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams while campaigning for Republican candidate Brian Kemp on Sunday. He attacked her stance on numerous issues, including the 2nd Amendment, crime, and immigrant rights.

articles.title: Bat enthusiasts captivated as millions take flight in Texas
articles.description: Bat watching has become a popular pastime near San Antonio as some 15 million bats take flight each evening, darkening the sky and even forcing some military flights to reroute.

articles.title: Utah Mayor killed in apparent ‘insider attack’ in Afghanistan
articles.description: Brent Taylor, a husband and father of seven, dedicated his life to service — both as mayor of North Ogden and in the Utah National Guard. He was killed on Saturday in Kabul in an apparent insider attack.
